title: VelocityVR
blurb: Shop furniture Virtually in 3D from the comfort of your home.

team.name: Govarthanan Ravi
team.about: Worked as a developer in the team

team.name: Srinivas Patibandla
team.about: Worked as developer in the team

content_html:
Inspiration: Virtual Shopping.

What it does: Furniture Catalog Browsing with dynamically retrieved 3D models.

How we built it: Used Wayfair API and Unity with Google Cardboard SDK.

Challenges we ran into: Not knowing any Unity and C# at all.

Accomplishments that we're proud of: Learned Unity, C# and Wayfair API and created a working VR app.

What we learned: Learned Unity, C# and Wayfair API.

What's next for VelocityVR: Create a shopping experience with our own 3D models using structure sensing.
content_md:
## Inspiration: Virtual Shopping.


## What it does: Furniture Catalog Browsing with dynamically retrieved 3D models.


## How we built it: Used Wayfair API and Unity with Google Cardboard SDK.


## Challenges we ran into: Not knowing any Unity and C# at all.


## Accomplishments that we're proud of: Learned Unity, C# and Wayfair API and created a working VR app.


## What we learned: Learned Unity, C# and Wayfair API.


## What's next for VelocityVR: Create a shopping experience with our own 3D models using structure sensing.
